mapper.select: select a.*, b.ctbny_pc, (b.ctbny_pc / a.cntr_obctr * 100) as percent from tb_cntr AS a left JOIN tb_cntr_ctbny AS b ON a.cntr_sn = b.cntr_sn
select a.*, b.ctbny_pc, (b.ctbny_pc / a.cntr_obctr * 100) as percent from tb_cntr AS a left JOIN tb_cntr_ctbny AS b ON a.cntr_sn = b.cntr_sn where cntr_category = #{cntr_category}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_cntr_btr (cntr_sn, mbr_sn, btn_nm, btr_pc, btr_adres1, btr_adres2, rgtr_id, rgtr_dt) values ( #{cntr_sn}, #{mbr_sn}, #{btn_nm}, #{btr_pc}, #{btr_adres1}, #{btr_adres2}, #{rgtr_id}, #{rgtr_dt})
replace into tb_cntr_ctbny (cntr_sn, ctbny_pc, rgtr_dt) select cntr_sn, sum(btr_pc), rgtr_dt from tb_cntr_btr where cntr_sn = #{cntr_sn}
mapper.select: select a.cntr_obctr, b.ctbny_pc, (b.ctbny_pc / a.cntr_obctr * 100) as percent from tb_cntr AS a INNER JOIN tb_cntr_ctbny AS b ON a.cntr_sn = b.cntr_sn WHERE b.cntr_sn = #{cntr_sn}
